channel.title: Oh no. Character Problems

item.title: Oh no. Character Problems
item.dc:creator: @Paril Paril
item.description:
@Paril wrote:

I don’t know what version of what I’m running as a server (I’m a temp host, he turned everything to “Blackscape”, argh), but anyway.

I locked myself out of my character with an invalid item! I’m not really a Java programmer (C/C++, actually), so I don’t know where to do to unlock myself. I tried compiling after editing those txt files in characters, no luck. Here’s the item:

character-item = 0 8566 1

I tell ya now not to pick that item up.

Where would I put a code like this:

				// Paril, maybe exception? I found item that kills the game!
				for (int n = 0; n < players[i].playerInventory.length; n++)
				{
					if (players[i].playerInventory[n] == 8566) // This item
					{
						players[i].playerInventory[n] = 0;					
						System.out.printIn ("Found item that crashes on "+players[i].playerName+"!");
					}
				}

-Paril

Read full topic
